content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. Can you please provide me with an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I would like to offer €500 per month for the apartment. What do you think about this price?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Aziz. While I appreciate your interest, I'm not sure if €500 per month is a fair rental price for this apartment. Could you please provide any additional information or considerations that you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Of course. I understand that the apartment is located in a prime area of the city and it is a modern apartment with all the amenities. I also know that the apartment is fully furnished. I am willing to negotiate on the price, but I want to make sure that it is reasonable and fair for both of us.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your understanding, Aziz. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a fair rental price for both of us. I would be happy to discuss this further with you. Could you please provide me with your contact information so that we can continue our conversation?
name: Heinrich Heine
